name: Walk in My Zapatos
description: Left click mouse to begin the game. Player uses left and right arrows to walk across the floor to the NPC. Up arrow allows player to jump. Player walks to token, which is then recorded in the score banner. The NPC then addresses player. Click on the arrow to learn the Spanish term for the assistive device. Then match English and Spanish words to correct container with the drag and drop function. A double click on the magnifying glass will bring up your first challenge in assessing what device to use and earn a point. Drag correct item to bucket to gather items to find the missing service dog, Milo.  You have now completed the core loop.
